name: Finnian Oakbrew
long_description: The barkeep is a lively old elf. He stands nearly six feet tall and looks as though he's seen his fair share of adventure in his younger days. He wears a leather tunic and buskins. The tavern's patrons seem to reguard him with a great deal of respect.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome! What can I get you to drink?
dialogue.default: We serve the finest ale and spirits this side of the mountains.
